name: Blemie's world tour: Halloween special
description: After the events of Bwt, Blemie and his boyfriend Davy decide to go on a Halloween date to Planet Many for a halloween party. The party is hosted by an immortal vampire named Carve who brings the human tradition of Halloween to other planets. She also has a dog that Blemie wants to see (he's a huge dog lover). So platform about to her darn mansion, party, talk to the guests, collect gamers and find the cute dog!
